sub_title: Business Process Manager Plant Maintenance & Engineering at ARLANXEO
summary:
My passion is to achieve added value in Maintenance & Equipment Reliability via innovation and improvements.

Recognized for 20+ years of success in global ERP Implementations.

Be Positive, Dare and Share !

★ ABOUT ME
Experienced Senior SAP EAM Consultant & Service Designer in Equipment Reliability. 
Focused on connectivity between assets and ERP systems via IOT.
Loves to travel, meeting people and and working together with different cultures.

★ EXPERTISE & TRACK RECORD
> 21 years experience in global SAP ERP Implementations & IT projects
> 5 years experience as Service Designer in Equipment Reliability (Assetwise APM)
> 10 years experience in Manufacturing 
> Experience in SAP S/4HANA global template Implementation

★ MY VISION ON MAINTENANCE AND EQUIPMENT RELIABILITY
- identify the As - Is 
- roadmap the To - Be 
- secure support from stakeholders
- start with your business processes
- initiate social networking globally and cross organizational  
- share knowledge, dare to make mistakes and learn from new technologies

★ CUSTOMERS
Some of my Customers: ARLANXEO, DSM Biomedical, DSM Sinochem Pharmaceuticals, DSM Elastomers, DSM Resins & Functional Materials, Aliancys, Sitech, DSM Nutritional Products, DSM Engineering Plastics, DSM Dyneema, DSM Food Specialties, DSM Business Services and Akzo Nobel Functional Chemicals.

★ WHAT CAN I DO FOR YOU?
Exchange information related to improvements in maintenance and asset reliability.
Providing added value using a structured approach and up to date technologies.
✉ heber1964@kpnmail.nl 
📞

contributors.headline: Business Process Manager Plant Maintenance & Engineering at ARLANXEO

projects.title: Donatello
projects.description:
Goal of the project
Donatello project: SAP implementation within DSM Biomedical Exton PA USA.
The main purpose of this project is to implement SAP at the Exton site to replace the Finance and Operations activities and processes that are now performed in the Oracle E-Business Application with minimal impact to the running business.      
Migrating to SAP from Oracle allows there to be one ERP system for all of Biomedical and will provide standardization of systems and processes, and increased capabilities to collaborate on projects and manufacturing.  This will improve financial reporting since all financial data will be stored in one system.  Additionally, the validated SAP Biomedical system will be supported globally.    

Activities carried out
I was responsible as a project member for:
•	SAP Manufacturing implementation. 
•	participate in sessions on-site to map current business processes and identify the detailed scope during blue printing phase. 
•	provide high-level training sessions with the key users within each specific domain. 
•	perform preliminary customizing and hands on sessions on site and remote to justify the detailed scope.

contributors.headline: Business Process Manager Plant Maintenance & Engineering at ARLANXEO

projects.title: SHAPE Improve Equipment Reliability
projects.description:
Goal of the project
SHAPE IER project: Global Improve Equipment Reliability implementation and Support at DSM. 
The IER process is meant to define the best maintenance strategy (i.e. ratio preventive & predictive / corrective maintenance) derived from the business goals and optimizes technical availability and integrity (License to Operate) of the assets and maintenance cost.

Activities carried out
I was overall responsible for the IT implementation and responsible for:
•	delivering the IT requirements during the blue printing phase. 
•	performing technical coordination and support during the request for proposal activities.  
•	performing SAP customizing and interfacing design as a global standard solution within DSM. 
•	during the implementation phase responsible for Assetwise APM configuration, testing, data migration, training, and key user support. 
•	Bentley Assetwise APM Implementation at sites, DSM Dyneema (Heerlen, Greenville), DSM Food specialties (Delft, Seclin), DSM Nutritional Products (Grenzach, Leon, Freeport), DSM Resins (Meppen), DSM Sinochem Pharmaceuticals (Toansa, Delft, Spain).
•	Global Improve Equipment Reliability Support using Bentley Assetwise APM.

contributors.headline: Business Process Manager Plant Maintenance & Engineering at ARLANXEO

projects.title: Up2One
projects.description:
Up2One project: Worldwide SAP PM/WM/MM/CATS/FICO Re-implementation within Resins.
Some European plants run their activities in a system together with Aliancys. This is not sustainable and Up2One aims to migrate these activities into the existing SAP NR1 environment.
This requires the implementation of Plant Maintenance and indirect purchasing (SRM) for the SAP NR1 system. The first project milestone was the go-live of the Meppen site, followed by the sites in Parets, Santa Margarida, Waalwijk, Hoek van Holland and Zwolle. From April 2017 onward, DRF will benefit from one SAP system with significantly reduced cost.

Activities carried out
I was responsible:
•	as IT project manager for the overall IT-coordination activities covering project budget management and transports. 
•	additionally, as project member responsible for the SAP PM/WM/CATS customizing and supporting the Business Process Experts during data migration.

contributors.headline: Business Process Manager Plant Maintenance & Engineering at ARLANXEO

projects.title: Tophat
projects.description:
Goal of the project
Tophat project: SAP PM/SRM & WM re-allocation for plant Schoonebeek.
Because DSM and CVC participated in the joint venture NewCo, in which DSM has 35% of the shares and CVC owns 65%, all DSM group direct IT services for former DCS and DFI will be transferred to the Aliancys IT organization. For DSM this means unbundling of all direct IT services for DFI and DCS delivered by DBS-ITSS and DRF. 

Activities carried out
I was responsible for:
•	SAP re-allocation and company code deletion. 
•	participation in blue printing. 
•	providing training in the Maintenance Work process to the IT consultants. 
•	performing the related customizing.
•	support of data migration. 
•	providing key user and on site go live support.

contributors.headline: Business Process Manager Plant Maintenance & Engineering at ARLANXEO

projects.title: SAP PM/CATS implementation within DAI at location Capua
projects.description:
Goal of the project
SAP PM/CATS implementation within DAI at location Capua.
In order to facilitate new investment projects, it should be possible by a key user to support the loading of asset master data themselves in SAP.

Activities carried out
I was responsible for:
•	development of LSMW programs which enables the mass load of asset master data. 
•	development of training material.
•	onsite key user training and testing using LSMW in SAP. 
•	key user support.

contributors.headline: Business Process Manager Plant Maintenance & Engineering at ARLANXEO

projects.title: Service Management Kernel
projects.description:
Goal of the project
SM Development project: standard Service Management process development.
In order to support service activities within DSM globally it was decided to develop a standard kernel solution for the Service management work process in SAP.

Activities carried out
As Project member, I was responsible for: 
•	PS/CATS implementation. 
•	supporting the functional requirements identification during the blue printing phase. 
•	development of the related business design scripts and related SAP customizing as a global standard solution within DSM. 
•	technical design specification.
•	development and testing of test scripts. 
•	development of training material.
•	implementation, data migration, training, and key user support.

contributors.headline: Business Process Manager Plant Maintenance & Engineering at ARLANXEO

projects.title: Triton
projects.description:
Goal of the project
Triton project: Worldwide SAP PM/WM/MM/CATS implementation within Resins.
One maintenance management system for all sites with improved preventive maintenance planning.
•	Improvement Plant Maintenance 
o	Imbedding Manufacturing Excellence principles leading to improved asset maintenance
o	Standardization across sites and elimination of different PM systems
o	Integrated system for PM, Purchasing MRO and FICO
•	Implementation of the DSM Apollo SAP kernel  
o	 Implementation Apollo postponed (not cancelled)
o	 ICT department Zwolle transferred to C-ICT as of January 2005
•	Comply with DSM standards (True Blue, IC)
•	Improvement purchase MRO
o	Participate in DSM Magneto project, reporting MRO spend	
o	Purchase of all MRO via SAP, integration with FICO and MM
•	Introduce Electronic Document Management for manufacturing

Activities carried out
As Project member, I was responsible for: 
•	PM/PS/WM/CATS implementation supporting the kernel Maintenance work process.
•	supporting the local functional requirements identification during the blue printing phase. 
•	development of the related business design scripts and related SAP customizing.
•	technical design specification.
•	development and testing of test scripts. 
•	development of training material.
•	implementation, data migration, training, and key user support.

contributors.headline: Business Process Manager Plant Maintenance & Engineering at ARLANXEO

projects.title: Copernicus
projects.description:
Goal of the project
In order to provide a service organization for all plants at the location Geleen, the DSM Manufacturing Center (Sitech) was founded covering manufacturing services, park services and Safety Health & Environment Services. The Copernicus project was the related IT implementation supporting this transition.

Activities carried out
As Project member, I was responsible for: 
•	SAP PS/CATS implementation supporting the Small Projects work process.
•	supporting the local functional requirements identification during the blue printing phase. 
•	development of the related business design scripts and related SAP customizing.
•	technical design specification.
•	development and testing of test scripts. 
•	development of training material.
•	implementation, data migration, training, and key user support.

contributors.headline: Business Process Manager Plant Maintenance & Engineering at ARLANXEO

projects.title: Global Chart of Accounts-conversion
projects.description:
Goal of the project
Global Chart of Accounts-conversion.
Within the Service Unit R/3 Environment (SURE) the COA used was not in line with the new required corporate accounting principles. The existing COA was replaced directly on the database tables via tools provided by SAP System Landscape Optimization Services.

Activities carried out
As project manager responsible for:
•	IT-coordination with SAP SLO.
•	data migration coordination with key users.
•	testing coordination with key users.
•	go-live coordination and key user support.

contributors.headline: Business Process Manager Plant Maintenance & Engineering at ARLANXEO

projects.title: Tiger

Project : TIGER at Akzo Nobel Functional Chemicals

Sites implemented :

• Arnhem, NL
• Herkenbosch, NL
• Rotterdam, NL
• Lima, US
• Gallipolis Ferry, US
• Novara, IT

Responsible for implementing the SAP Plant Maintenance, Project Systems, Warehouse Management and Cross Application Time Sheet

profile_positions.title: Business Process Manager Plant Maintenance & Engineering
Stream Lead Plant Maintenance SAP S4 Implementation

profile_positions.description:
The Business Solution Consultant fulfills an important role in connecting the business and service provider for global services and applications. He/she is the face of the organization to the customer, playing a key role supporting the global applications, and their associated projects and changes in cooperation with the customer. He/she  must have strong analytical and product management skills, including a thorough understanding of how to interpret customer business needs and translate them into application requirements and solutions already available. 

DSM is a Life Science and Material Science company located across the globe. It is therefore very crucial for a Business Solution Consultant to be aware of and sensitive to cultural, language, and time zone differences, and be able to perform his/her responsibilities in an efficient and high quality manner. This quality is also required for the coordination and management role for work outsourced to India.
profile_positions.title: Business Solution Consultant
Solution Designer Maintenance & Manufacturing at DSM IT BV
